snippet: If the N.F.L. cribbed some ideas from the other leagues, it could spruce up the Pro Bowl and make it something more than the last mile marker before the exit for the Super Bowl.
abstract: Fifth Down column suggests that if the NFL cribbed some ideas from the other leagues, it could spruce up the Pro Bowl and make it something more than the last mile marker before the exit for the Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: If the N.F.L. cribbed some ideas from the other leagues, it could spruce up the Pro Bowl and make it something more than the last mile marker before the exit for the Super Bowl.

headline.seo: N.F.L.’s Pro Bowl Is Postseason Party Few Want to Attend
headline.main: N.F.L.’s Pro Bowl Is Postseason Party Few Want to Attend
headline.print_headline: Fixes for a Lifeless Postseason Appendage
